Why Choose Three Uilas?

Our electric farm utility vehicles are designed with Hawaiian farmers in mind, combining innovation with local needs.

Fully Electric

Zero emissions, quiet operation, and low maintenance costs for sustainable farming.

Affordable Quality

Premium build quality at prices that make sense for local farmers and businesses.

Warranty & Support

Comprehensive 2-year parts warranty with local service and support when you need it most.

Our Electric Farm Utility Vehicles

Discover our range of electric cargo trikes designed for Hawaiian farming and business needs.

Electric Cargo Trike - Standard Model

Our flagship electric cargo trike features a robust dump bed design perfect for transporting farm supplies, tools, and harvested produce. Built with Hawaiian terrain in mind.

1200W electric motor with 48V battery system
500lb cargo capacity with hydraulic dump bed
Up to 55 miles range on single charge
Maximum speed of 25 mph
All-terrain tires for farm and road use
2-year parts warranty included
Get Pricing & Availability

Custom-Built for Hawaii

Three Uilas was founded with a simple mission: to provide Hawaiian farmers and businesses with affordable, high-quality electric utility vehicles that can handle the unique challenges of island farming.

Our electric cargo trikes are custom-built in China specifically for Hawaiian terrain and climate, featuring robust construction, reliable electric systems, and practical features that make everyday farm work easier and more efficient.

By choosing Three Uilas, you're getting a quality vehicle designed for local needs, backed by our commitment to supporting Hawaii's agricultural community with reliable service and a comprehensive 2-year parts warranty.
